lead_paragraph: The A.C.L.U. of New Mexico writes that the federal border protection agency “should have nothing to do with militias.”

headline.print_headline: When Vigilante Militias Patrol the Southern Border
headline.main: When Vigilante Militias Patrol the Southern Border
